data.title: Bill Patton Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Bill Patton on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Bill Patton including The Rawhide Terror, Sand, and more.
data.text: Bill Patton (June 2, 1894 â December 12, 1951) was an American actor of the silent and early sound eras. Born in Amarillo, Texas, he debuted in the film industry in The Boss of the Lazy Y in 1918. After small roles in several films, he received his first starring role in 1921's Outlawed. Over the next six years he starred in more than 20 films. In 1927, he returned to smaller roles, which continued through the advent of talking pictures. His last performance on screen was in a small role in the classic The Picture of Dorian Gray in 1945. He died on December 12, 1951.
